display_long_description:
Get ready for an adventure of a lifetime with Open Space VR, the ultimate VR app for Oculus Quest. In this thrilling game, you play the role of a spacecraft captain who must explore the vast and mysterious galaxy to find your way back home.

Equipped with a space suit, you'll venture out into the open space to collect trash and recycle it into fuel for your ship. Your ship comes with a state-of-the-art system that allows you to drive it, a mini-map that scans the space around you and shows you the objects nearby. Use your skills and ingenuity to travel between planets, gather cosmic trash, and keep your ship powered up.

As you progress through the game, you'll uncover a captivating story that will keep you on the edge of your seat. You're on a mission to check the theory of reaching light speed with an experimental engine created by the best brains on Earth. 

You find yourself lost in space, unsure of where you are and how long you've been flying. Your shuttle's energy is almost depleted, and you must find a way to return to Earth. With your wits and determination, you'll explore the galaxy, unravel the mysteries that lie ahead, and ultimately find your way back home.

Open Space VR is a must-have app for any VR enthusiast looking for an immersive and thrilling experience. Download now and start your journey to the stars!
